body:
Comment 9: 
Looks good to me.  I think the way to test this in the build
would be to create a sub-process (Brad has done this in
other tests), passing the windows flag
CREATE_NEW_PROCESS_GROUP to the process
creation.  Then send _it_ the CtrlBreak, after it has
indicate that it is ready for it, and check that it can
send back 'yes i got it' (and not die).

But I am happy with the test as it is.
_Status changed to **Fixed**._
